titleStmt.title: A mad kinde of wooing, or, a Dialogue betweene Will the simple, and Nan the subtill, with their louing agreement To the tune of the new dance at the Red Bull Play-house.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. G[osson]. [on] London bridge,

notesStmt.note: Verse - " Sweet Nancie I doe loue thée deare,".
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
